programme.title: Social Space
programme.desc: Tom Brady hates our Moon...but Mars is a completely different story. From cosmic cosmology to Musk See TV, we scroll through our galactic web of fascinating featurettes from everyone we follow. Oh and Astronomy VS Astrology! Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Movies: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.desc: A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Music
programme.desc: A musical and visual celebration of our connection with our home planet and the universe. Duration: 3600

programme.title: UFO Congress update
programme.desc: The Pentagon has showcased declassified UFO-related videos and photos to Congress that included footage of a small object zipping past a military pilot as well as glowing triangles in the night sky. Duration: 190

programme.title: Helen Ramirez - On the Border of a New Frontier
programme.desc: Space Channel Crews caught up with Helen Ramirez (Brownsville’s Deputy City Manager) to discuss her efforts to build a wholistic space ecosystem in the Rio Grande Valley. From rockets to investment and communications, the City of Brownsville is leading the way as Texas becomes the epicenter for America’s new space economy. Duration: 277

programme.title: Silicon Valley of Space
programme.desc: The Silicon Valley of Space, quietly building a Gateway to Mars on the Texas/Mexico border. Duration: 150

programme.title: Trash Bags in Space
programme.desc: Nanarocks has developed an innovative way to manage waste in space, with an idea everyone on Earth can relate to Duration: 292

programme.title: Health Report - NASA Food Upgrade
programme.desc: In coordination with the Canadian Space Agency, NASA is asking the public to help create sustainable food production technology that can be done with few resources and minimal waste. Duration: 180

programme.title: NEWS | Starship and Polaris Program Update
programme.desc: Elon announced the Starship program may move to Cape Canaveral, and Jared Isaacman in tandem with SpaceX announced a new mission series named the Polaris Program. Duration: 350

programme.title: Latest News - Red Moon Rising
programme.desc: In 2021, it achieved an average of more than one launch per week for the first time in its orbital spaceflight history, making it the busiest year for its space program to date. We watched the country pass many milestones from successfully landing its first rover on Mars and test flying a hypersonic spaceplane to building the core module for its Tiangong space station and launching the first taikonauts onto the said module. Duration: 361

programme.title: Space Tourist - The First Space Hotel
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel News Update- Space X, SLS and a Universe of Life

programme.title: Space Tourist - The First Space Hotel
programme.desc: Space Tourist takes us out of this world to a company making plans to build a hotel in space as well as those closer to home. Duration: 1800

programme.title: 2021: Space Channel's Year in Space
programme.desc: 2021 brought historic advances for mankind in space. From private space industry launching civilians into space, troubles on the ISS and China becoming a true space competitor, it has been amazing year to witness. And for the first time...there was Space Channel. Enjoy a look back at our coverage of launches, news and documentaries as well as movies, music and series. Duration: 14400

programme.title: Planets with David Becker
programme.desc: For more than three decades, Grammy and Emmy nominated guitarist, composer, producer David Becker has continued to define himself as one of the best and most unique voices in jazz and contemporary music by combining diverse influences and a passion for the new and different, and his ability to play for the present while always keeping an eye on the past and future. He has led the critically acclaimed DAVID BECKER TRIBUNE to a worldwide audience by performing in more than 35 countries. Duration: 3600
